promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic legendary bison fighting-type pokemon wearing stone armor. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or bison. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Battleroar, a a dynamic legendary bison fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Royal Blades. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bison", "fighting" or "Battleroar". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, bison-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: In mighty coliseums, Battleroar reigns with Royal Blades. This legendary combatant charges with unyielding ferocity, turning foes to dust.
